GridProps.name: children
GridProps.description: React nodes to be displayed next to the search bar

GridProps.name: emptyState
GridProps.description: {`{ text: string, image: string }`} props for{' '} EmptyState component shown when there are no items in grid

GridProps.name: getGroupId
GridProps.description: A function called returning group ID of a given grid item that is used to sort items by group. Returns item.groupId by default.

GridProps.name: getId
GridProps.description: A function called returning ID of a given grid item that is used to identify the item. Returns item.id by default.

GridProps.name: getThumbnailLabel
GridProps.description: A function called returning label of a given grid item that is used to display the item's thumbnail label. Returns item.label by default.

GridProps.name: getThumbnailName
GridProps.description: A function called returning name of a given grid item that is used to display the item's thumbnail name. Returns item.name by default.

GridProps.name: getThumbnailSource
GridProps.description: A function called returning thumbnail URL of a given grid item that is used to display the item's thumbnail image. Returns{' '} item.src by default.

GridProps.name: groups
GridProps.description: {`{ id: string | number, title: string }[]`} object representing file groups

GridProps.name: icon
GridProps.deprecated: String icon variant is deprecated, use the React components directly from the `@procore/core-icons/dist` package

GridProps.name: isLoading
GridProps.description: Show/Hide loading indicator of the content

GridProps.name: isLoadingMore
GridProps.description: Show/Hide loading indicator at the list bottom

GridProps.name: items
searchQuery
GridProps.description: Allows controlling the search input value. Can be used with onSearch to customize the default string-based search

GridProps.name: onScrollBottom
GridProps.description: Optional function that automatically executes when scrolling reaches the last item.

GridProps.name: onSearch
GridProps.description: Allows customizing the default string-based search by passing a different set of items every time onSearch is called with query string as a single parameter
